Credit Line: The Cesnola Collection, Purchased by subscription, 1874–76
Description: Translucent pale blue green.Irregular, uneven rim, folded over and in, forming collar to inside of mouth; short neck; bulbous body, drawn out on one side into slender, upturned nozzle; pushed-in bottom.Intact, but with one small hole on neck; a few pinprick bubbles; dulling, faint iridescence, and limy encrustation and weathering.
